name: Ambient AGI
description: AmbientAGI: Powering the Next Generation of Autonomous, Always-On Agents In the ever-evolving landscape of Web3 and AI, a new paradigm is emerging—one that frees AI from the confines of traditional "chat-based" interactions. AmbientAGI is poised to lead this movement by fueling an ecosystem of always-listening, always-learning agents that continuously respond to real-world events—no human prompt needed. And when humans do step in, it's only when it truly matters. The AmbientAGI Ecosystem AmbientAGI goes beyond being a mere token. It's the cornerstone of next-level AI automation: - Cross-Chain Deployments: Launch on networks like Solana, coming soon to Ethereum, BNB Chain, or Polygon - Easy Configuration: Define triggers, data sources, and actions tailored to your trading style - Scale on Demand: Replicate agents in seconds to cover more markets - Ongoing Evolution: Agents learn and improve over time using real-time feedback Developer Incentives: Builders who enhance protocols or integrations can earn bounties.
